resources.string: Automatically download attachments for incoming emails
Only download attachments when manually requested
In order to receive daily Quote notification, please enable Auto-Start. You also can change this setting in app settings. This setting will not affect battery life!
Auto-Start not enabled! Missing feature (NOTIF ON) or aborted by user (NOTIF OFF)

In order to receive daily Quote notification when battery saver is ON, disable battery saver for this app. You can change this setting in app settings. After dismiss, pop-up for enable run in background should appear, if not, already enabled. This setting will not affect battery life!
